Disembrangling Programming

The simple life of a web developer — by Paul Craciunoiu (About) (The List)

Following gandalf’s idea, I’m starting this to-do list for things I want to experience in this life.

Created on: 10/10/10 Last updated: 10/10/10

  1. Save someone’s life.

  2. Cause a car accident.

  3. Spend a week in Tibet and visit the Monks there.

  4. Visit Greece.

    • Mediterranean sea.
    • Ancient Greek artifacts.
  5. Visit Oahu, Hawaii

  6. Visit Puerto Rico. (planned)

  7. Visit Miami. (planned)

  8. See the Amazonian rainforest.

  9. See an African safari.

  10. Visit Sweden/Denmark.

  11. Visit Japan.

  12. Eat at French Laundry (or other expensive yet ridiculously delicious place).

  13. Sky dive.
  14. Snorkel with tropical fish.
  15. Surf.

  16. Surf at Pipeline, Oahu, Hawaii.

  17. Go to outer space and see this.

  18. Own a hammock.

  19. Visit Paris.
  20. Visit Yosemite National Park.
    • See Vernal, Nevada, Bridalveil waterfalls.
    • Watch the sunset from Sentinel’s Dome.
  21. Watch the sunset from Carmel Beach, Monterey.

  22. Have sex on a beach.

  23. Take a Ferrari or Lamborghini for a test drive.

  24. Hug a tree.

  25. Fall asleep while watching a movie projected on the ceiling.

  26. Visit Egypt and see the Great Pyramid.

  27. Attend a basketball game.

  28. See Loreena McKennitt in concert.

  29. See Evanescence in concert.

  30. Bungee jump.

  31. See an iceberg.

  32. Visit Greenland.

  33. See a total eclipse of the sun.

  34. Go rock climbing.

  35. Visit Ireland.

  36. Give a speech in front of more than a thousand people (yes, I want to be that famous).

  37. Have and raise at least 2 children.

  38. Scuba dive at a tropical island.

  39. Make out during a drive-in movie.

  40. Have a really unusual wedding (hopefully unusual in a good way).

  41. Practice meditation for an entire week.

  42. Speak at least one of the following languages fluently:

    • Italian
    • German
    • Spanish
    • Greek
    • British (just kidding)

  43. Pull off a good-enough British accent.

  44. Visit Romanian monasteries from Moldova.

  45. Swim in the Dead Sea.

  46. Visit Thailand.

  47. Visit Madagascar.

  48. Play a game with a chimpanzee.

  49. Reach a 6% body fat percentage.

  50. Write a book (I’m cheating, it can be about anything).

  51. Have sex in a car.

  52. Fire a real gun.

  53. Live on an island for a month.

  54. Sleep on top of a building.

  55. Visit New York.

  56. Touch a girl's face in the dark for so long that I remember it perfectly.

  57. Shave my head.

  58. Dye my hair purple or blonde.

  59. Visit Zion National Park and hike Angel’s Landing

  60. Visit Yosemite (again) and hike to the highest point.

  61. Dive in a submarine.

  62. Visit Australia

  63. See a kangaroo in the wild (i.e. outside of a cage).

  64. Dress up for halloween and show it off.

  65. Build a large sand castle (e.g. longer than 0.5m).

  66. Ride a horse.

  67. Ski at Lake Tahoe.

I work as a web developer for Mozilla, with main focus on Django, Python, and PHP. Occasionally, I write tutorials or post other information I find interesting.

I enjoy doing freelance work for other websites, mostly non-profits. If you're interested in my services, contact me through one of the links below.

Follow me -- Email me -- My GitHub

Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome. — Arthur Robert Ashe, Jr
